short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Rotate the pie to match colors of a bouncing ball!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Test your reflexes in this dynamic color-matching game as a single, randomly colored ball bounces between the top of the screen and the rotating pie below.

How to Play:

1) The pie consists of 6 colored slices, each covering 60 degrees.

2) Use the left and right arrow keys to rotate the pie counterclockwise and clockwise, respectively.

3) Align the pie so that the slice directly below the falling ball matches its color.

4) If the ball hits a pie slice of the same color, it will bounce back up, change to a new random color, and fall again.

5) If the colors do not match, the game ends!

Strategy:

- Quickly adjust the pie's rotation to ensure the correct color slice aligns with the bouncing ball.

- As the ball changes color with each successful bounce, stay sharp and keep your reactions quick to keep the game going!

How long can you keep the ball bouncing and rack up your high score in Color Pie Bouncer? Give it a try and test your skills!
